plexToken: <Plex X-Token here in quotes, no spaces and no < or > in any of this>
tvIp: <IP address of your TV here, with quotes>
plexServerIp: <the IP address of the PC where you're running the node app, likely 192.168.blah.blah>
tvdbToken: <tvdb token, its free, just register for dev token, this may change in the future - in quotes>
